name: Pocket Pirate
description:
You are a pirate with big dreams but a small raft. Show what you can do by growing your raft and your wallet in this fun rotating brain teaser. Can you collect all the treasure without sinking into the murky depths? Controls:

Movement: WASD or ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️  to move your pirate

Raft controls:  comma or period   to rotate your raft clockwise or counterclockwise

Pause: P

You can rebind your controls in the pause menu
